tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Puja for almost 2 years for regular check ups. The first time I visited her for pelvic pain. She explained the problem to me in a very efficient manner. She is very compassionate and understanding doctor. She listened to my problem and gave solutions accordingly. Although the pain did not resolve for a long time but she worked with me throughout and we figured out what was causing the pain and it finally resolved. 
Ever since then, I trust her advice more than anyone. 
If you are looking for a doctor who listens to you, she is your best choice. 

God bless her!
reply_text: Thank you so much dear, Wish u  a speedy recovery.God bless

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
We Huma Arif, Its our first pregnancy and when we came to know about it, we started searching for the best gynecologist and luckily in our third trimester we got to know about gynecologist Dr. Puja Prasad Ma'am through reviews available online.. All reviews were full of praises and appreciations for Ma'am.. 
As it was our third trimester, we knew we were quite late in meeting with Ma'am, but we decided to visit Ma'am and our first appointment with Ma'am was really really amazing.. Ma'am is so calm, polite and soft spoken.. Ma'am understood our problem of meeting her in third trimester and thoroughly listened to our concerns like a friend and prescribed appropriate tests and medications..  
So our wonderful journey with Ma'am started and we kept looking for our appointments with Ma'am as Ma'am clarified our every single doubt and explained everything in so simple & uncomplicated way..
Ma'am never prescribes any unnecessary test or medications.. 
Under her supervision, our pregnancy period went so smoothly and tranquilly... 
Puja Ma'am was always there on phone and Whatsapp whenever we had any concern or doubt.. and even in COVID atmosphere, Puja Ma'am examined me properly on every visit.. 

We were so anxious about delivery and desired a normal delivery and Ma'am also supported us for the same.. Moreover at delivery time, Ma'am kept us motivating for normal delivery till the end even when we were unsure about it.. By God's grace and just because of Ma'am, we had our little one delivered via normal delivery... We can't thank Ma'am enough for her efforts.. Ma'am was on fast on our delivery day and even then Ma'am was with us the whole time.. Thank you sooooo much Puja Ma'am... We will be forever grateful to Ma'am..
reply_text:
Thank you so much dear for your words
God always bless the family

review:
I’m glad and thankful to my close friend who recommended Dr Puja Prasad. I had my second son delivered at Yashoda Hospital under her guidance and I’m thankful that she was my Obstetrician. Though the baby was positioned breach and I had to get him delivered though cesarean procedure, the healing and guidance by Dr Puja made it so much easier for me. *** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** *** ***** She is someone who will always recommend natural ways of healing, treatment and will never prescribe a long list of medicines. She is very open and honest and discusses the issues/challenges in details. He aura and nature is such that you instantly feel connected and better after meeting her.

Thank you so much ma’am for everything you have done...😊😊😊

Hi,
My name is Joy Mukherjee and I would like to share my experience. In our last week of 3 tremister ( in this tuff pandemic situation) my doctor from St. Stephens hospital went on leaves and said I can't help you folks please contact the hospital emergency team and left us in between. I hope you could imagine my situation at that time. 
Some how with a close refrence we contacted Dr. Puja Prasad and she helped us in all means and even gone extra miles. She stood up for us and helped us and we been blessed with a baby girl/an Angle!!!
I am falling short of words expressing my experience, I hope everyone can understand!!!
Dr. Puja Prasad is and experienced and very good doctor we ever met. She guided us all means and even with the hospital at the last moment. 
Would like to say thanks a ton Doc !!! Me and my family will never forget what you did and how you helped and guided us. ******* **** *** **** ****** * **** ****** So polite and explains, suggests and guide you the right way* * **** *** ***** ***** ***** *** **** ** *** ******* ***** ***
